description: Padel Centar Košutnjak offers 3 outdoor padel courts at the Serbian Institute of Sport in Košutnjak, with on-site lockers, showers, and a cafe.

Padel Bros is one of the largest padel centers in the region, featuring 7 world-class courts (4 indoor, 3 outdoor) with professional lighting, a café-bar, pro shop, and even a sauna for players to relax.
Sportsko Selo is a multi-sport complex in central Belgrade (Deligradska Street) that features the first padel court in Serbia, available for booking daily with convenient on-site facilities.
Vamos Padel, established in 2019, is located on the Ada Ciganlija lake island and offers 4 outdoor padel courts in a scenic environment with modern locker rooms and friendly staff.
Loko Padel is a smaller padel venue located in the Železnik area of Belgrade with 2 outdoor courts and a laid-back atmosphere (and even a selection of craft beers for players to enjoy).
Football & Padel Club Coin is a sports dome in New Belgrade (Block 23) that houses a padel court alongside small football pitches, offering affordable rates and late-night play.
Belgrade Squash Club, primarily a squash center, added a padel court in 2023 at its location, allowing players to enjoy padel from 8am to 11pm daily alongside the club’s squash facilities and cafe.
Padel Klub Dorćol operates at the FK GSP Polet football grounds in the Dorćol area of Belgrade, offering 4 outdoor padel courts by the Danube river.

Beogradski Padel Klub (Belgrade Padel Club) is a 6-court facility near the Danube in Dorćol and is one of the city’s premier padel venues, offering both indoor (covered) courts, a social atmosphere, and extended opening hours.
Riverside Padel Center is located at Ada Huja by the Danube River in Belgrade, offering 4 outdoor padel courts in a unique riverside setting.

Think Padel is a modern padel club on Ada Ciganlija featuring 7 courts (4 covered courts including 3 doubles and 1 single, plus 3 outdoor courts) along with amenities like new locker rooms, showers, and a cafe.
Prime Padel Club Kalemegdan is uniquely situated within the historic Kalemegdan Fortress in Belgrade, offering 2 premium outdoor padel courts with a stunning backdrop.

Prime Padel Club Humska is located within Partizan Stadium complex, featuring 6 state-of-the-art courts, a café, locker rooms, and an equipment shop, providing a top-notch padel experience in the heart of Belgrade.
Padel Centar Belgrade Waterfront opened in 2025 across from Galerija shopping mall (under the Gazela bridge), providing 3 outdoor courts in the city’s new waterfront district.
Centar Reket Sportova in Novi Sad is a racket sports center at the fairgrounds, boasting 6 padel courts (alongside tennis courts) where players can book both day and evening sessions.
The Padel (Novi Sad) opened in 2023 near the Novi Sad Fair (Branka Bajića street), offering 4 padel courts and introducing this fast-growing sport to the local community.
Padel Balon Novi Sad (also known as 021 Padel Arena) is the city’s first indoor padel facility, featuring a covered padel court in a bubble hall, allowing year-round play regardless of weather.

Padel Centar Gravity, located in Subotica (northern Serbia), is a state-of-the-art padel complex with 4 modern courts (indoors), complete with comfortable changing rooms, a terrace café, free parking, and other amenities.

TRK Zlatibor (Turističko-rekreativni kompleks Zlatibor) is the main sports complex on Zlatibor mountain, offering padel courts alongside basketball, volleyball, handball, tennis, and other facilities. Host venue for ISF U15 Gymnasiade padel 2025.
